documents.title: Use React for Frontend Development
documents.content:
# Use React for Frontend Development

Status: Accepted
Date: 2023-06-10
Tags: frontend, react, ui

## Context

We need to choose a frontend framework that is widely adopted, has good community support, and provides a component-based architecture.

## Decision

We will use React for all frontend development.

## Consequences

- Component-based architecture for better code organization
- Large ecosystem of libraries and tools
- Good developer experience with JSX
- Need for additional state management solutions

documents.title: Use TypeScript for Backend Development
documents.content:
# Use TypeScript for Backend Development

Status: Accepted
Date: 2023-05-15
Tags: backend, typescript, nodejs

## Context

We need to choose a programming language for our backend services that provides type safety and good developer experience.

## Decision

We will use TypeScript for all backend development.

## Consequences

- Improved type safety and developer experience
- Better IDE support and code completion
- Slight learning curve for developers not familiar with TypeScript
- Need for compilation step before running code
